response.original_title: Blaze and the Monster Machines: Wild Wheels Escape to Animal Island
response.overview: Blaze and his friends find themselves on Animal Island, transforming into high-speed animal trucks in order to save the day. Fans can join the gang as they thwart Lazard the lizard-truck's evil plan, help their new friend Tooks the toucan-truck, travel to Insect City and cheer on Blaze in the Super Sky Race. As always, Blaze, AJ and the monster machines go on wild rides and use their S.T.E.M skills to solve the problems around them.
response.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines: Wild Wheels Escape to Animal Island
